Test.Description:
Checks that lock operation on a lock succeeds only if the number of other threads' unlock operations on that lock match the number of corresponding lock operations. In more detail: - lock the object O twice - start the helper thread which tries to lock O and sets a flag after that - unlock the object O once - check that the flag is not set yet - unlock the object O once more - check that the flag is set now (There are even more details in the code since we need also accurate synchronized access to the flag)
Covered assertions assert_thread094
